member.name: T:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator
member.summary: Represents a source generator that copies the whole method, and replaces some variables with cached fields.

member.name: T:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.AggregateSuccessTransformResult
member.summary: Represents a transform result that creates a list of instances to be generated once.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.AggregateSuccessTransformResult.#ctor(Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.SuccessTransformResult[])
member.summary: Represents a transform result that creates a list of instances to be generated once.

member.summary: Indicates the results created.

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.InterceptsLocationAttributeSourceCode
member.summary: Indicates the raw source code for intercepts location attribute.

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.ValidVariableNames
member.summary: Represents a list of properties that will be replaced with cached members.
member.remarks: Please note that here we don't replace expression grid.GetSolution() with Solution at present because it'll change syntax node (from to ). It may be considered in the future.

member.name: M:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.Initialize(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IncrementalGeneratorInitializationContext)
member.remarks: This generator will aim to methods, to find whether a method block contains at least one intercepted usage. If so, such method will be replaced with cached method. The requirement is that, the callee method should be applied with '[InterceptorMethodCaller]'.

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.IC0100
member.summary: Represents message "Necessary type is missing".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.IC0101
member.summary: Represents message "Method marked '[InterceptorMethodCaller]' or '[Cached]' can only be block body".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.IC0102
member.summary: Represents message "Method marked '[InterceptorMethodCaller]' requires at least one invocation expression that references to a method marked '[Cached]'".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.IC0103
member.summary: Represents message "Method marked '[Cached]' cannot be ".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.IC0104
member.summary: Represents message "Lacks of usage of necessary comments: 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_BEGIN' and 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_END'".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.IC0105
member.summary: Represents message "Duplicate comments: 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_BEGIN' and 'VARIABLE_DECLARATION_END'".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.IC0106
member.summary: Represents message "If method is marked '[Cached]', it is disallowed to consume instance members by using or ".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.IC0107
member.summary: Represents message "Method marked '[Cached]' cannot be generic".

member.name: F:Sudoku.SourceGeneration.CachedMethodGenerator.IC0108
member.summary: Represents message "Method cannot be local function, lambda and the other functions that cannot be referenced by name".
